channel.title: CVE Feed for Slic3r -- libslic3r
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Slic3r -- libslic3r

item.title: CVE-2022-36788|2024-08-03T10:14:28.480Z -- slic3r -- libslic3r
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the TriangleMesh clone functionality of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 and Master Commit b1a5500. A specially-crafted STL file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-38072|2024-08-03T10:45:52.486Z -- slic3r -- libslic3r
item.description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the stl_fix_normal_directions functionality of ADMesh Master Commit 767a105 and v0.98.4. A specially-crafted stl file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
